name: International Union of Marine Insurance
goal: The International Union of Marine Insurance (IUMI) is a professional body which is run by and for its members. IUMI represents national and international marine insurers and reinsurers, and considers issues of interest to the worldwide marine insurance industry. IUMI currently has 41 national associations as members, protecting and advancing their interests. IUMIâ€™s roots date back to 1874.
interests: Banking and financial services, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Offshore Safety Directive
- Places of Refuge EU Operational Guidelines
- Trade in Services Agreement (TiSA)
- Cargo theft
- Cybersecurity
- eFreight
- unmanned vessels
